participant_1.name: Todd
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and enthusiastic, Todd loves superheroes and enjoys pretending to be one.
participant_1.background: I love comic books. I am 8 years old. My favorite hero is Superman. I want to grow up to be a superhero one day. My name is Todd.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Playful and adventurous, Emily enjoys creative play and has fond memories of being a kid.
participant_2.background: My parents would take my brother and I when we were little. I used to wear a cape. It's one of my favorite hobbies. We liked to pretend we were superheroes.

content.text: What's your favorite comic book?
I like Superman too! I used to wear a cape when I was little.
Me too! I used to pretend I was Superman all the time.
I used to pretend I was Superman and Batman.
That's cool! What was your favorite thing about Superman?
I liked that he was always there to save the day.
Me too! He was the best.
What do you think your favorite superhero power would be?
I think I'd want the power to fly.
That would be so cool! I'd want the power to be invisible.
That would be fun! You could do so many things.
Yeah, you could spy on people!
That would be so much fun!
Yeah, it would be great.
I think we should start a superhero club.
That would be so much fun! We could meet up and pretend to be superheroes.
That would be awesome! We could even make costumes.
That would be so cool! We could call ourselves the Super Kids.
That's a great name! I'm so excited to start the Super Kids.
Me too! I can't wait to be a superhero.
